abstract: Publishes elements only after a specified time interval elapses between events.

declaration.code: func debounce<S>(for dueTime: S.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, scheduler: S, options: S.SchedulerOptions? = nil) -> Publishers.Debounce<Self, S> where S : Scheduler

overview:
## Return Value

A publisher that publishes events only after a specified time elapses.

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/debounce(for:scheduler:options:)] operator to control the number of values and time between delivery of values from the upstream publisher. This operator is useful to process bursty or high-volume event streams where you need to reduce the number of values delivered to the downstream to a rate you specify.

In this example, a [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/PassthroughSubject] publishes elements on a schedule defined by the `bounces` array. The array is composed of tuples representing a value sent by the [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/PassthroughSubject], and a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/TimeInterval] ranging from one-quarter second up to 2 seconds that drives a delivery timer. As the queue builds, elements arriving faster than one-half second `debounceInterval` are discarded, while elements arriving at a rate slower than `debounceInterval` are passed through to the [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/sink(receiveValue:)] operator.

items.description: Measures and emits the time interval between events received from an upstream publisher.
items.name: measureInterval(using:options:)

items.description: Delays delivery of all output to the downstream receiver by a specified amount of time on a particular scheduler.
items.name: delay(for:tolerance:scheduler:options:)

items.description: Publishes either the most-recent or first element published by the upstream publisher in the specified time interval.
items.name: throttle(for:scheduler:latest:)

items.description: Terminates publishing if the upstream publisher exceeds the specified time interval without producing an element.
items.name: timeout(_:scheduler:options:customError:)

title: debounce(for:scheduler:options:)
